string.name: name
string.value: Special Order: Find Master M's Orders!
There's a strange vibe flowing through Maple World. Who is this Master M that can make everyone act so strange? If anyone, #b#p9000036##k should know. I should go visit her.
Agent E said that in order to protect Maple World, I must find #t4032000#s. \n\n#i04032000# #t4032000# #b#c04032000# / 20#k
I found #t4032000#s and delivered them. I hope #b#p9000036##k does a good job analyzing them...
You must be Special Agent #b#h0##k. An urgent order has arrived for you. Ready to hear it?
I'm sure you already knew that Maple World is in danger of a serious threat.

That's right. The way things are going, we might all be destroyed. There have been reports of mysterious circles appearing in town, and some have even said they've witnessed a UFO kidnapping Master M.
We must find #t4032000#s and protect Maple World. Bring back #b20#k #b#t4032000#s#k that monsters nearby are secretly looking at.
You don't deserve to be a special agent.
Bring back #b20#k #b#t4032000#s#k. That is your mission.
